snippet.title: Arken Age | Official Reveal Trailer | Steam & PS VR2
snippet.description:
Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2274200/Arken_Age/
PS Store Wishlist: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009596

Arken Age is a VR action-adventure game set in the Bio-Chasm—a terraformed fantasy world created by the Grand Arborist. Engage in full physics combat using Arkenite infused swords & guns—and freely explore the densely filled environments under siege by Hyperion's neural corruption.

Follow Arken Age's development on:
Discord: https://discord.gg/AQfR3y7Pry
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ArkenAgeVR

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games #virtualreality #VR #playstationvr #steamvr #arkenage

Arken Age © 2023 Vitruvius Technologies Inc. Arken Age® and related logos are registered trademarks or trademarks of Vitruvius Technologies Inc. All right reserved.

Rated Mature
